org.sontana

Class CoreTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.CoreTime

  • public class CoreTime
extends java.lang.Object
    The Time class represents the details of the Core's CPU time.

    This is NOT the same as MinuetoStopWatch and is not intended to be used outside of the Core.

    Author:
    Christophe Simon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void beginFrame()
      Starts a timer for the current frame.
      static float endFrame()
      Ends timer for the current frame.
      static float getDeltaTime()
      Get the time in seconds that it took to complete the current frame.
      static float getLastDeltaTime()
      Get the time in seconds that it took to complete the last frame.
      static float getProgramTime()
      Get the runtime in seconds since the Core began running.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
